Room.Name: Nissiau Lane
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Nissiau Lane, between a number of small shops.
Room.LongDescription: Nissiau Lane runs west from Evenborough Way, through a number of small shops and stores. On the north side of the road is Sir Edward's Royal Swordsmith, craftsman of the finest swords in the kingdom. On the south side of the road is the Pier Lithium Imports building, where all incoming ship supplies must be checked and registered.
